items.sentence: We stopped at the river to allow our horses to drink.
What are some things that you and Tom have in common?
There are three men in the next room waiting for you.
What kinds of things do you do when you're in Boston?
I don't usually work on Mondays, but last week I did.
My mom brought home the weirdest-shaped squash today.
My boss said that he was pleased with my performance.
Did you really think that Tom would help you do that?
It looks like a dog to me, but Tom thinks it's a fox.
I thought you said you'd do that yesterday afternoon.
